name: Knit Remembrance Day // Veterans Day Poppy Bib
description:
In 2008 I married the love of my life, my hero, my soldier. Since that time, remembering those that have fought for our rights and freedoms, as well as those in other countries, has become an honored necessity in our household. So, when we had our first son two years later, it was important for us that he somehow be able to take part in the annual tradition of Remembrance Day - and out of a desire for a baby-safe poppy, the Remembrance Day bib was born.

Handmade with love, care and a little prayer for those we've lost, the Poppy Bib is knit using beautiful Sweet Fiber Yarns: http://sweetfiberyarns.com/yarns/

Three button-holes allow for adjusting from 0-36 months.

Machine-washable.

name: Yoga Socks // Toeless Socks // Open Heel Socks // Knit Yoga Socks
description:
For yoga. For lounging. For you.

These simple socks have so many uses, from keeping your ankles warm in yoga class, to post-pedicure pampering, to just lounging around the house.

Knit with an open toe and open heel, these cozy socks were handmade for you using delicious yarns created by Sweet Fiber Yarns: http://www.sweetfiberyarns.com

Actual color may be slightly different than it appears on your computer screen.

SIZING:
All measurements are approximate.

Ankle length: 4.5"
Foot length: 4"

name: Knit Twisted Headband
description:
Om for your head.

This easy-going, twisted headband keeps your hair in place without the aching headache. Wear it in yoga or slip it on as you head out the door. This sister goes anywhere and packs light and easy.

This item is handmade using Indigo Moon's "Twilight Teal": http://www.indigomoonyarns.com/shop/twilight-teal-merino-wool-p-794.html. However, headbands can be made to order.

Actual color may be slightly different than it appears on your computer screen.

name: Baby Bonnet // Newborn Spring Hat
description:
Inspired by the beautiful Spring weather of British Columbia, this bonnet makes for a lightweight transition out of the cold and into the warmer seasons.

Handmade for your little one using Sirdar's cozy, squishy Snuggly Baby Bamboo (http://www.sirdar.co.uk/yarns/babyYarns/dkBaby/Snuggly_Baby_Bamboo_DK_F071/shades)

COLOR: Seaside
Actual colors may be slightly different than it appears on your computer screen.

SIZE: 0 - 3 months
